New Records: Anthony Volpe became the first player in World Series history to log four RBIs and two steals in a game
Key Match Events: Anthony Volpe's go-ahead grand slam off Dodgers reliever Daniel Hudson in the third inning
Austin Wells sent a Landon Knack fastball over the right-field wall for a sixth-inning solo shot
Gleyber Torres smacked a three-run shot to right-center in the eighth
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees were facing elimination in Game 4 and needed a win to stay alive in the World Series
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Volpe said the team's win was a reminder that they 'are not going to go down easy at all'
Aaron Boone said the team 'finally got to see the top blow off Yankee Stadium in a World Series game'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game began with a Freddie Freeman home run
Freddie Freeman extended his personal World Series homer streak to a record-setting six games
The Yankees are the first team to force a Game 5 when down 3-0 in a World Series since the Reds in 1970 against the Orioles
